title: The role of rural circular migration in shaping weather risk management for smallholder farmers in India, Nepal, and Bangladesh
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Global Environmental Change, Volume 89

Author(s): Divya Solomon, Asif Ishtiaque, Arun Agarwal, Joshua M. Gray, Maria Carmen Lemos, Ignatius Moben, Balwinder Singh, Meha Jain
